issue.title: [CI] Github starting to migrate "windows-latest" tag from windows 2019 to windows 2022
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15682](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15682). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Announcement: https://github.blog/changelog/2022-01-11-github-actions-jobs-running-on-windows-latest-are-now-running-on-windows-server-2022/

It will be rolling out over the next 8 weeks.  I noticed because they changed one of the runners for my local fork.

Some of our builds assume windows-latest means 2019.
